OOC: Might be. If it is then lets say I shot only two.

::Hot Rod/Cleder/Rixer/Forrior/Byler/Firearm::

Hot Rod stoped and transformed to bot mode.
"Your a Maximal? Ok, now I'm confused. The Chivitons came to us asking
for help defending their base. We came and you were attacking it, so we
attacked you. But your a Maximal too. Somethings up."

The other catch up.
"Whats going o?" Asked Cleder.
"He is a Maximal," replyed Hot Rod.
"What? What in the name of Cybertron is going on?"
